My glass? It's half full.
And I believe in free refills.

Above all, I am a creative thinker with a huge imagination. I have an eye for composition and a healthy obsession with color and typography. I am known for my playful, upbeat, and modern sense of style. I aspire to constantly surround myself with inspiration and to explore my creativity.

Jennifer Nettik

Graphic Designer
  • I have called Colorado home for all of my life.
  • Cat mom to two adorable siamese cats, Momo and Mavi.
  • If I could eat a giant bowl of macaroni and cheese paired with a good craft beer for every meal, I probably would.
  • Comic book reader, Whovian, wannabe cosplayer.
  • I secretly wish I could be a broadway star.

Get in touch.
I'm excited already!
